fields.comment: This is by far the best platform I've used for finding student jobs. The messaging system makes it easy to communicate with potential employers. I especially like how simple it is to filter jobs based on location and schedule.
Decent platform overall. The job search functionality works well, but I find the application process a bit cumbersome. It would be nice to have a more streamlined way to apply to multiple jobs.
The platform is very intuitive and easy to use. I found a part-time job within a week of signing up. The job matching is quite accurate and the application process is straightforward.
Good experience overall. The filter options are very useful and the interface is clear. Would appreciate a bit more guidance during the application steps, but messaging worked well.
Excellent platform! Found qualified candidates quickly and the application tracking is seamless. Highly recommend to other employers looking for student workers.
Platform works but could use some improvements. Listing jobs is straightforward, but the messaging notifications sometimes lag. Overall acceptable.
Very user-friendly and responsive. I appreciate the clear dashboard and the ability to track all applications in one place. Minor improvement: add more filter criteria.
Not very impressed. The job matches were not relevant, and the application form was confusing at times. Messaging could be more reliable.
